701638f-a.title: Bronx: Post Road - 251st Street (West)
701638f-a.text:
5122 Post Road, east side, north from West 251st Street, showing
the Hadley House. It is said to have given shelter to George Washington
more than once. Its present occupant and owner states that the stone
south wing of the house is at this date (1937) slightly more than 200
years old and contained a slave room. The wooden part was added about
100 years later.
1898.
Cift of Randall Comfort.
